definitions.name: addEtorProcessingTag
definitions.description: Adds ETOR processing tag to all messages

definitions.name: convertToOmlOrder
definitions.description: Converts an ORM order to OML

definitions.name: addContactSectionToPatientResource
definitions.description: Adds mother's contact section to patient in OML Order

definitions.name: ucsdOruUpdateSendingFacilityNamespace
definitions.description: Updates UCSD ORU Sending Facility's Namespace Id (MSH-4) to 'CDPH'. It also removes Universal Id (MSH-4.2) and Universal Id Type (MSH-4.3).

definitions.name: ucsdOruUpdateReceivingApplicationNamespace
definitions.description: Updates UCSD ORU Receiving Application's Namespace Id (MSH-5.1) to 'EPIC'. It also removes Universal Id (MSH-5.2) and Universal Id Type (MSH-5.3)

definitions.name: ucsdOruRemoveMessageTypeStructure
definitions.description: Removes UCSD ORU's Message Structure (MSH-9.3) from the Message Type (MSH-9)

definitions.name: ucsdOruSwitchPlacerOrderAndGroupNumbers
definitions.description: Swaps UCSD ORU's Placer Order Number (ORC-2) and Placer Group Number (ORC-4)

definitions.name: ucsdOruRemovePatientIdentifiers
definitions.description: Removes UCSD ORU's Assigning Authority (PID-3.4) and Identifier Type Code (PID-3.5) from Patient Identifier List (PID-3)
